views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 12

Thanks to LockConversations you can now lock the conversations you want.

Just swipe to the right on the conversation you want to lock/unlock.

When a conversation is locked, you have to enter your password to acces to it. 
In addition to that, it switches to "do not disturb" mode in order to avoid receiving unwanted notifications.

@VincentMdlM

Configure options from Settings.
